name: ENDOOR
description:
Our submission to Ludum Dare 51. You are stuck in an old bunker where everything is malfunctioning every 10 seconds. You must repair everything in time or you'll surely be doomed. How long can you survive?

Controls:
A, D for character movement
W, S for going up and down ladders
Space for jumping
E for interacting with objects
Mouse movement and left click for minigames

Restarts are not implemented, you have to relaunch the game to restart.
